title: IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview Project Attendant Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IIT Roorkee) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Attendant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given b...
